Projects

AutoTrend - Automated Demand Prediction Platform

Tools: Python, AutoML, Streamlit, Pandas, SQL

Developed a web application that automates demand prediction by allowing users to upload datasets and get forecasts using ensemble AutoML models. Integrated NLP-based query interaction for intuitive insights.

  • Implemented AutoML pipeline for model training and selection.
  • Designed query-based interaction for dynamic user queries on demand data.
  • Created visualization dashboards to show predictions and analytics.

Real-Time Phishing Detection System

Tools: Python, Machine Learning, Flask, REST APIs

Built a real-time phishing detection system using ensemble learning and adaptive learning models. Integrated multi-factor authentication and crowdsourced threat intelligence to improve detection accuracy.

  • Developed adaptive ML model to detect phishing URLs and emails.
  • Implemented detailed reporting dashboard for threat analytics.

Medrep - Medical Case Sharing Platform

Tools: React, Node.js, MongoDB

Created a platform for healthcare professionals to share, discuss, and vote on important medical cases and medicine-related topics, helping knowledge sharing in the medical community.
